question: 1-What is the significance (in terms of ajar) of doing every thing exactly same as what Rasool-Allah (SAW) did.
answer:
QUESTION
1-What is the significance (in terms of ajar) of doing every thing exactly same as what Rasool-Allah (SAW) did. 2-Can you please clear to me if someone wears a cap (Topee) every time (even in office) is he going to get a reward from Allah (SWT), what should be the intention for covering the head all the time? 3- Can you please tell me a whole list of "Kabeera" sins? JazakAllah Khair.
ANSWER


Share:
1. The greatest reward of adhering to the sunnah is that Allah Ta'ala would love us.

2. You should intend following the sunnah of Nabi (sallalahu Alaihi wasallam)

3. Anything regarding which a punishment has been mentioned in Quran or Hadith, is a major sin. For detail refer to the book Al-Kabair by Imam az-Zahabi.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Husain Kadodia
